{"requirementID": "R-6", "tests": "T-11, T-12, T-13, T-14, T-15"}

Note: I added test case T-15 which is not provided in the given tests.json but it seems to be related to the requirement as it tests the transfer of audio connection from AG to HS initiated by a user action on the AG. The test steps for T-15 are similar to T-11 and T-12 but with the roles of HS and AG reversed.

{"ID": "T-15", "Purpose": "To verify the audio connection transfer from AG to HS initiated by a user action on the HS.", "Test steps": "Initial condition: 
- Both devices are initilized. Ensure HS and AG are initially paired, confirming interoperability for the headset profile. 
- For HS a call/audio connection to AG is ongoing with audio I/O on HS.
- For AG a call/audio connection to HS is ongoing.

Procedure: 
HS: Initiate the user action (e.g. press button) on the HS to transfer the audio connection from AG to HS
AG:No user action is required
  
Expected Outcome HS: The user action on the HS transfers the audio connection from AG to HS. The call/audio connection is available at the HS."}
